Statement.Sql: INSERT INTO LOOKUP (mUpdated,mGroup,mName,mAbbreviation,mSort) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mAbbreviation=?,mSort=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
select * from VALUES v, FIELD f where f.mId=v.mFieldId and mRecord=?
select v.*,f.*,s.mDisplay,s.mSort from VALUES v, FIELD f, FIELDS s where f.mId=v.mFieldId and f.mId=s.mFieldId and mRecord=? and mFieldId=?
